meanings.definition: Teasing or joking in a playful manner.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the joshing banter with her siblings.
meanings.sent3: The joshing tone lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: His joshing nature made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The joshing atmosphere was contagious and fun.

meanings.definition: Engaging in light-hearted banter or teasing.
meanings.sent1: Their joshing remarks were all in good fun.
meanings.sent2: The joshing exchange between them was friendly.
meanings.sent3: The joshing back and forth brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her joshing comments added a spark to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The joshing interaction created a cheerful atmosphere.
